languages.text: "От кредо, но не от Омниссии. Древние нормы устарели, броня стала тюрьмой. Катехизисы были написаны рукой смертных, а значит, во имя Деус Механикус, они могут быть отредактированы рукой смертного".

"From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."
languages.original_text: "От кредо, но не от Омниссии. Древние нормы устарели, броня стала тюрьмой. Катехизисы были написаны рукой смертных, а значит, во имя Деус Механикус, они могут быть отредактированы рукой смертного".

traits.locale_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms; therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms; therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."

traits.locale_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."

traits.locale_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “没错，我背弃了那些信条，但我并没有背弃欧姆尼塞亚。那些古老的规矩已经过时了。曾经的盔甲，如今已经变成了枷锁。那些教义都是以凡人之手写下的，因此以万机之神的名义，它们也同样可以被凡人之手所修改。”
languages.original_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."

traits.locale_text: “没错，我背弃了那些信条，但我并没有背弃欧姆尼塞亚。那些古老的规矩已经过时了。曾经的盔甲，如今已经变成了枷锁。那些教义都是以凡人之手写下的，因此以万机之神的名义，它们也同样可以被凡人之手所修改。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Del credo sí, pero no del Omnissiah. Las normas antiguas se han vuelo obsoletas. Lo que era una armadura ahora es una prisión. El catequismo lo escribieron manos mortales. Por lo tanto, en nombre del Deus Mechanicus, otra mano mortal puede editarlos».
languages.original_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."

traits.locale_text: «Del credo sí, pero no del Omnissiah. Las normas antiguas se han vuelo obsoletas. Lo que era una armadura ahora es una prisión. El catequismo lo escribieron manos mortales. Por lo tanto, en nombre del Deus Mechanicus, otra mano mortal puede editarlos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「教条を参照するならば、そうだ。だが、万機神によるならば違う。古代の規範は時代遅れになった。かつて鎧であったものは、今や牢獄である。従って、デウス・メカニカスの名において、人間の手がそれを編集することができるのだ」
languages.original_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."

traits.locale_text: 「教条を参照するならば、そうだ。だが、万機神によるならば違う。古代の規範は時代遅れになった。かつて鎧であったものは、今や牢獄である。従って、デウス・メカニカスの名において、人間の手がそれを編集することができるのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Vom Glauben, ja, nicht aber vom Omnissiah. Die uralten Normen sind veraltet. Was einst Rüstung war, ist nun ein Gefängnis. Sterbliche Hände haben die Katechismen verfasst — daher kann eine sterbliche Hand sie im Namen des Deus Mechanicus überarbeiten."
languages.original_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."

traits.locale_text: "Vom Glauben, ja, nicht aber vom Omnissiah. Die uralten Normen sind veraltet. Was einst Rüstung war, ist nun ein Gefängnis. Sterbliche Hände haben die Katechismen verfasst — daher kann eine sterbliche Hand sie im Namen des Deus Mechanicus überarbeiten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Au crédo, oui, mais pas à l'Omnimessie. Les normes d'antan sont obsolètes ; ce qui était autrefois une armure est aujourd'hui une prison. Puisque ce sont des mains mortelles qui ont écrit les catéchismes, une autre main mortelle peut les modifier au nom du Deus Mechanicus. »
languages.original_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."

traits.locale_text: « Au crédo, oui, mais pas à l'Omnimessie. Les normes d'antan sont obsolètes ; ce qui était autrefois une armure est aujourd'hui une prison. Puisque ce sont des mains mortelles qui ont écrit les catéchismes, une autre main mortelle peut les modifier au nom du Deus Mechanicus. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."

languages.text: "İtikada evet. Hermesih'e hayır. Kadim normlar eskidi. Eskiden zırh olan şey artık zindan. İlmihâlleri yazanlar ölümlü ellerdi. Dolayısıyla ölümlü bir el, Deus Mechanicus adına onları düzenleyebilir."
languages.original_text: "From the creed, yes, but not from the Omnissiah. The ancient norms have grown obsolete. What was once armour is now a prison. Mortal hands wrote the catechisms — therefore, in the name of the Deus Mechanicus, a mortal hand may edit them."

traits.locale_text: "İtikata evet. Hermesih'e değil. Kadim normlar artık eskimiş durumda. Eskiden zırh görevi gören şey artık bir hapishane. İlmihâlleri yazanlar ölümlü ellerdi, dolayısıyla da Deus Mechanicus adına onları ölümlü bir el düzenleyebilir de."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
